Although the inorganic layers are slightly distorted by the spaÂ­
tial constraints imposed by the diammonium cations, these
perovskites have a typical cornerÂ­sharing structure. Through the
crystallography in these 2D materials, the wellÂ­defined cation

applied for the synthesis of nonÂ­lead 2D perovskites.
